ModMetaData.name: Overcapped Accuracy (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Nales
ModMetaData.description:
This is an update of Nales's Overcapped Accuracy mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1624094549
- Only recompiled against the 1.4 libs, no other changes made. - Seems to work fine through limited testing in a modlist with 400+ other mods. - Please post here if there are issues using this version and I'll see if I can offer a fix.
Original description: Allows ranged weapons to have more than 100% accuracy, albeit with diminishing returns after 100%.
